levels.name: Eldoria
levels.words: In the quiet town of Eldoria, shadows danced on cobblestone streets. Amelia, a curious girl with silver hair, discovered an ancient book in her attic. Its pages whispered forgotten tales. As she read, the room filled with ethereal light, revealing a portal to a realm of dreams. Brave and trembling, Amelia stepped through, embarking on a journey where words wove magic, and every keystroke shaped her destiny. Eldoria awaited the scribe who would inscribe new legends into the Book of Whispers.

levels.name: Finley
levels.words: In the heart of Everwood Forest, a mischievous fox named Finley darted between ancient trees. One day, he stumbled upon a hidden glade adorned with glowing mushrooms. Intrigued, Finley touched a mushroom, and to his surprise, it whispered forgotten secrets. The forest echoed with enchantment as Finley, now imbued with mystical knowledge, embarked on a quest. His nimble paws danced across the mossy ground, leaving a trail of luminous prints. Legends say those who follow Finley's path unlock the magic within the trees, revealing the ethereal harmony of Everwood.
